userProfile.summary: Full-stack engineer with 5+ years of experience building scalable web applications. Expertise in React, Node.js, Python, and cloud infrastructure.

workExperience.title: Senior Software Engineer
workExperience.description: Led development of microservices architecture serving 1M+ users

customAnswers.whyThisRole: I am passionate about building impactful products and solving complex technical challenges. This role aligns perfectly with my experience in distributed systems and my interest in AI/ML applications.
customAnswers.whyThisCompany: I admire the company's mission to democratize AI and the engineering culture focused on shipping quality products quickly.
customAnswers.biggestStrength: My ability to break down complex problems into manageable pieces and deliver incrementally while maintaining code quality.
customAnswers.biggestWeakness: I sometimes spend too much time optimizing before getting feedback. I've learned to ship MVPs faster and iterate.
